title: Topic 004 Question 038
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system. The current VIP pool uses a subnet of 192.168.203.0/24 and has routing configured to use BGP.
In the administrator portal, you receive an alert that the public IP addresses are at 95 percent utilization.
You need to add 192.168.204.0/24 to the public IP address pool.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
